result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Paulette M Miller in court with attorney Christopher Scott Carson.   District Attorney's Office Tim Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Restitution was only addressed on file 16CM405 only.
Restitution hearing on July 8, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Paulette M Miller in court with attorney Christopher Scott Carson.  Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin. State moves to dismiss and read-in. Court grants and the matter is dismissed and read-in.  Matter to be scheduled for restitution hearing, as the state is asking for $1624.84 to be paid to the victim Polly L.  Restitution hearing scheduled for July 8, 2016 at 09:00 am.

State presents arguments. Court denied the Motion. Court sets the matter for trial.  Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for June 7, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Jury status hearing scheduled for June 1, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Paulette M Miller in court with attorney Christopher Scott Carson.  Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense counsel is requesting adjournment as they are waiting for Discovery. Court grants.  Hearing scheduled for April 11, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Paulette M Miller in court with attorney Christopher Scott Carson.  Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense counsel was just retained and is waiting for Discovery and requests adjournment. Court grants.  Hearing scheduled for February 29, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Hearing at 01-25-2016 09:30 am

Defendant Paulette M Miller in court.  Jayne Davis Dewire appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant stated that she has been trying to speak with Mr. Suha, but has gotten no response. Pre-trial offer was provided to the defendant. Defendant is requesting more time to hire Attorney Carson.  Hearing scheduled for January 25, 2016 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Paulette M Miller in court.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant stated that she does not wish to have counsel and does not qualify for the public defender. Defendant would like to speak the DA that is assigned to the case. Court advised her to speak with a attorney before the next court date.  Hearing scheduled for December 21, 2015 at 08:30 am.
